Key:
Kurumi, what are you thinking? Are you trying
to eat me? Is she the enemy, or...?
Translation:
Kurumi, ¿en qué estás pensando?
¿Estás intentando comerme? ¿Es ella el enemigo, o...?

Key: The more I think about it, I don't get it...
Translation: Cuanto más lo pienso, no lo entiendo...

Key: ...Kurumi?
Shido-san.
What are you doing?
I have been doing some thinking.
...Shido-san?
What is it?
What do you think of me?
Huh...?
Would you mind telling me?
Where is this coming from?
Want to seal you.
Consider you as an "enemy".
...Don't know.

...want to seal your powers, so you can be a
normal girl like the others. That's what I want.
Translation:
...quiero sellar tus poderes, para que puedas ser una
chica normal como las demás. Eso es lo que quiero.

Key: I see.

If we don't do that, then you will bring sadness
to many people. Including yourself.
Translation:
Si no lo hacemos, traerás tristeza a mucha gente.
Incluyéndote a ti misma.

Key:
You may have a point. Happiness and I are
not too well acquainted.
Translation:
Puede que tengas razón. La felicidad y
yo no nos conocemos muy bien.

Key:
The past few days have been fun. Like
something out of a dream.
Translation:
Los últimos días han sido divertidos.
Como salidos de un sueño.

Key: Kurumi...?
Good-bye, Shido-san.
H-Hey!

(And that's how... Kurumi disappeared into
the night.)
Translation:
(Y así fue como... Kurumi
desapareció en la noche.)

Key:
(Ever since that evening, I never saw Kurumi
again. I don't think I'll ever see her again...)
Translation:
(Desde aquella noche, no he vuelto a ver a Kurumi.
Creo que nunca la volveré a ver...)

Key:
(Was I in the wrong...? Maybe if I had said
something better in the moment...)
Translation:
(¿Me equivoqué...? Tal vez si hubiera
dicho algo mejor en el momento...)

Key: (It was a decision I'd have to live with...)
Translation: (Era una decisión con la que tendría que vivir...)

Key:
...probably still think of you as an enemy.
I mean, you're still after me, aren't you?
Translation:
...probablemente aún te considere un enemigo.
Quiero decir, todavía me persigues, ¿no?

Key: Yes, I am.
Then I can't trust you fully yet.
Translation: Entonces aún no puedo confiar plenamente en ti.

Key: ...Very well.

So what's on your mind? What are you trying
to do?

It's unfortunate. I believed that being with you
would allow me to distract myself from those
things, but I suppose I was wrong to think so.
Translation:
Es una pena. Creí que estar contigo me permitiría
distraerme de esas cosas, pero supongo que
me equivoqué al pensarlo.

Key: Kurumi...?

Shido-san, you are currently hollow. You
don't look too delicious, but... oh well.
Translation:
Shido-san, actualmente estás hueco.
No te ves muy delicioso, pero... oh bueno.

Key:
You've become too much a part of me.
So... never let yourself escape from me.
Translation:
Te has vuelto demasiado parte de mí.  Así que…
nunca te permitas escapar de mí.

Key: What? What do you mean?!
Kurumi, stop! If you continue this, you'll—!
Translation: ¡Kurumi, para! ¡Si continúas con esto, vas a...!

Key: You still have me wrong.
I haven't been able to return for some time.
Translation: Hace tiempo que no puedo volver.

Key: K-Kuru—

We can be together forever like this, Shido-san.
I must return to where I am needed.
Translation:
Podemos estar juntos para siempre así, Shido-san.
Debo volver a donde me necesitan.

Key:
Hey Shido-san, please hold onto the memory
of me. All of it, okay?
Translation:
Hey Shido-san, por favor, aferrate a mi recuerdo.
Todo, ¿de acuerdo?

Key: KIHIHI HIHIHIHIHIHIHIHI!

Honestly, I don't know. I have no idea what
kind of person you are.
Translation:
Sinceramente, no lo sé. No tengo ni idea
de qué clase de persona eres.

Key: I guess you'd be... an enemy.
But you're not a bad person. That, I trust.
Translation: Pero no eres una mala persona. En eso confío.

Key:
So, I still don't know. Those are my honest
feelings.
Translation:
Así que todavía no lo sé.
Esos son mis sinceros sentimientos.

Key: So, would you tell me more about yourself?
Well...

I'm not going to force it out of you now. You
can tell me when you decide to open up to me.
Translation:
No te lo voy a sacar a la fuerza ahora.
Puedes decírmelo cuando decidas abrirte a mí.

Key: There is one thing I can tell you.
Translation: Hay una cosa que puedo decirte.

Key:
The shrine on the outskirts of this town.
If you ever need to speak with me, I will
be there.
Translation:
El santuario en las afueras de esta ciudad.
Si alguna vez necesitas hablar conmigo,
allí estaré.

Key: ...I see.
I will be on my way now.
All right. You gonna be okay on your own?
Translation: De acuerdo. ¿Vas a estar bien por tu cuenta?

Key: Haha, how comical. I'm a Spirit, remember?
Translation: Jaja, qué cómico. Soy un Espíritu, ¿recuerdas?

Key: Spirit or not, you're still a girl.
Translation: Espíritu o no, sigues siendo una chica.

Key:
Someone who needed to be escorted home
last night needn't lecture me on the matter,
but I appreciate the sentiment.
Translation:
Alguien que anoche necesitó que le acompañaran
a casa no necesita sermonearme al respecto,
pero aprecio el sentimiento.

Key: R-Right...
Kurumi, I've decided to trust you.
Translation: Kurumi, he decidido confiar en ti.

Key: Kurumi, I trust you.

(I wonder if Kurumi is opening up to me. I've
been thinking about it, but I have yet to find
an answer.)
Translation:
(Me pregunto si Kurumi se está abriendo a mí.
He estado pensando en ello, pero aún no
he encontrado una respuesta).

Key: In the end, is there nothing I can do?
Translation: Al final, ¿no hay nada que pueda hacer?

Key:
(All I can do for now, is bring down Kurumi's
walls.)
Translation:
(Todo lo que puedo hacer por ahora,
es derribar los muros de Kurumi.)

Key: ...I'll go on a date.
(That's how I'll learn more about Kurumi.)

Taking my time is fine. There are days when...
even Kurumi may appear sad. She's an ordinary
girl.
Translation:
Tomarme mi tiempo está bien. Hay días en los que…
incluso Kurumi puede parecer triste.
Es una chica normal.

Key: All right, I'm going to go to the shrine tomorrow.
Translation: De acuerdo, mañana iré al santuario.

Key: ...Who is it?
Sorry for visiting so late.

Rinne? Oh, don't worry about it.
Um, is something wrong?
Translation:
¿Rinne? Oh, no te preocupes.
Um, ¿pasa algo?

Key: I wanted to ask you something, Shido.
What is it?
Yes, well... It appears that you've decided.
Translation: Sí, bueno... Parece que has decidido.

Key: What are you talking about?

You said, you wanted to know more about
Tokisaki-san.
Translation:
Dijiste que querías saber
más sobre Tokisaki-san.

Key: Yeah, I do.
I see. So, that's your answer then, Shido?
Translation: Ya veo. Entonces, ¿esa es tu respuesta, Shido?

Key: Yeah, it is.
Hey, Shido. Promise me something.
Promise...? What for?

That you'll take good care of Tokisaki-san from
now on. No matter what happens, you won't
let her go. Promise me.
Translation:
Que cuidarás bien de Tokisaki-san a partir de ahora.
Pase lo que pase, no la dejarás marchar.
Prométemelo.

Key:
Wh-What's gotten into you? You don't need
to tell me that...
Translation: ¿Qué te pasa? No necesitas decirme que...

Key:
Please, I want you to promise. Promise me
that you will think only of Tokisaki-San, or
else your heart will drift away some day.
Translation:
Por favor, quiero que me lo prometas. Prométeme
que sólo pensarás en Tokisaki-San, o tu
corazón se alejará algún día.

Key: Rinne...
Please...

Okay, I promise. Man's word. I promise... to take
good care of Kurumi.
Translation:
De acuerdo, lo prometo. Palabra de hombre.
Prometo... cuidar bien de Kurumi.

Key:
Okay, I knew you'd make that promise with
me.
Translation: Vale, sabía que harías esa promesa conmigo.

Key: Haha, seriously? What's gotten into you?

I have faith in you. I trust you, Shido. Don't
forget your promise. Don't break it either, okay?
Translation:
Tengo fe en ti. Confío en ti, Shido.
No olvides tu promesa. Tampoco la rompas, ¿vale?

Key: Of course.
If you break it, then you must pay.
I-I know.
I see. As long as you understand.

Wh-What's the big deal? Why are you threatening
me?
Translation:
¿Cuál es el problema?
¿Por qué me amenazas?

Key: Hehe... Sorry.
But...

You'll be fine, right? I'm sure if it's Shido,
he'll be fine.
Translation:
Estarás bien, ¿verdad? Estoy seguro
de que si es Shido, estará bien.

Key: Wh-What was that just now?!
Hey, Rinne... Did you just see―

Huh? Rinne's gone?
When did she...?

Well, it is pretty late...
I should head to bed as well.
Translation:
Bueno, es bastante tarde…
Yo también debería irme a la cama.

Key:
...In this dream... no one can become happy...
Shido Itsuka... I hope your next dream will be
a happy one...
Translation:
...En este sueño... nadie puede llegar a ser feliz... 
Shido Itsuka... Espero que tu próximo
sueño sea feliz...
